data.text: @westaustralian Where has the FLU gone? Poor boy probably needs a lemsip and a good rest and he'll be right.
@ClayGolledge @westaustralian By that rationale you must have already had it Clay

@_marching_Ents_ @westaustralian Of course that's how it's been equated. You're simply demonstrating selective memory because otherwise you'd feel foolish for falling for it. Here's your challenge for today, do a Google search of news articles and government announcements from 2020 and 2021 using that term.
@westaustralian More sickly diseased vaccinated idiots spreading that virus around!

@EasyBreezyTeazy @_marching_Ents_ @westaustralian @CHO_WAHealth @MarkMcGowanMP If you don’t want your baby girl getting sick then keep her at home! Don’t expect everyone else to wear a mask that is nothing more than a sheep muzzle! https://t.co/raf1cRGWAd

@_marching_Ents_ @westaustralian @CHO_WAHealth @MarkMcGowanMP Yes and we want him to do a whole lot better by: Mandating LEVEL 2, if not LEVEL 3, protections NOW.
Pushing N95/P2 masks, wearing one himself would be a start
Keep 7 days quarantine for travellers. Yes, don't worry about the other states, speak out and do it
JUST DO SOMETHING
@ClayGolledge @westaustralian Isolation will give him more time to play online word games so industries in his portfolio will be safe a little longer.
